tshuab kev kawm: Algorithms uas pab kom computers kawm los ntawm cov ntaub ntawv
neural network: Computing system tshwm sim los ntawm cov qauv ntawm lub hlwb
kev kawm tob: Siv ntau txheej txheej neural networks rau kev ua haujlwm nyuaj
nlp ua: Ua kom cov khoos phis tawj nkag siab thiab ua cov lus tib neeg
computer tsis pom kev: Tso cai rau cov khoos phis tawj kom 'pom' thiab txhais cov ntaub ntawv pom
txhawb kev kawm: Kawm los ntawm kev sim-thiab-kev ua yuam kev nrog cov khoom plig thiab kev rau txim
saib xyuas kev kawm: Kawm los ntawm cov ntaub ntawv sau npe nrog cov tswv yim-tso tawm khub
tsis saib xyuas kev kawm: Nrhiav cov qauv hauv cov ntaub ntawv yam tsis muaj cov ntawv sau ua ntej
cov ntaub ntawv mining: Tshawb nrhiav cov qauv hauv cov ntaub ntawv loj thiab nyuaj
tus kws tshaj lij system: Simulates lub peev xwm txiav txim siab ntawm tib neeg tus kws tshaj lij
nrhiav algorithm: Methodically tshawb nrhiav qhov chaw teeb meem los nrhiav kev daws teeb meem
kev paub sawv cev: Yuav ua li cas cov ntaub ntawv raug teeb tsa thiab khaws cia rau AI systems
neeg hlau: Teb nrog kev tsim, kev tsim kho, thiab kev siv cov neeg hlau
chatbot: Lub computer program uas simulates kev sib tham nrog tib neeg
agi: Hypothetical AI nrog tib neeg-qib kev txawj ntse thoob plaws ntau txoj haujlwm
genetic algorithm: Tshawb nrhiav cov txheej txheem tshwm sim los ntawm cov txheej txheem evolution
tsob ntoo txiav txim: Tsob ntoo zoo li qauv rau kev faib cov ntaub ntawv raws li cov yam ntxwv
txhawb vector tshuab: Algorithm nrhiav ib kab lossis hyperplane uas zoo tshaj plaws cais cov ntaub ntawv
bayesian network: Probabilistic qauv uas sawv cev rau kev sib raug zoo ntawm cov variables
fuzzy logic: Deals nrog lub laj thawj uas yog kwv yees ntau dua li qhov tseeb
natural language tiam: Tsim cov ntawv zoo li tib neeg los ntawm cov ntaub ntawv tsim
kev soj ntsuam kev xav: Kev txiav txim siab lub suab nrov lossis lub siab xav tom qab ib daim ntawv
daim duab paub: Txheeb xyuas cov khoom lossis cov yam ntxwv hauv cov duab
ntsej muag paub: Biometric technology uas txheeb xyuas cov tib neeg los ntawm lub ntsej muag
autonomous tsheb: Cov tsheb uas tuaj yeem hnov lawv ib puag ncig thiab taug kev yam tsis muaj tib neeg lub tswv yim
tshuab txhais lus: Automated txhais cov ntawv ntawm ib hom lus mus rau lwm tus
kev pom zoo system: Kwv yees tus neeg siv qhov kev nyiam los qhia cov khoom lossis cov ntsiab lus
tus yeeb ncuab piv txwv: Cov tswv yim tsim los dag cov qauv kev kawm tshuab
hloov kev kawm: Rov qab siv kev paub los ntawm ib txoj haujlwm los txhim kho kev kawm ntawm lwm tus
generative qauv: AI qauv muaj peev xwm tsim cov ntaub ntawv tshiab zoo ib yam li nws cov txheej txheem kev cob qhia
symbolic AI: AI raws li kev tswj cov cim thiab cov cai (kev sib piv nrog cov neural networks)
multi-tus neeg saib xyuas system: Sau ntawm AI tus neeg sawv cev cuam tshuam hauv ib puag ncig sib koom
probabilistic programming: Siv cov lus programming los txhais cov qauv tsim nyog
neuromorphic xam: Kho vajtse tsim los ua kom zoo li kev ua haujlwm ntawm cov kabmob lom neeg
